Orbit Parameter Message (OPM)¶

class ccsds_ndm.Opm(header, segment)¶

Represents a CCSDS Orbit Parameter Message (OPM).

Parameters:

  • header (OdmHeader) – The message header.

  • segment (OpmSegment) – The data segment.

  • data (str) – Input string/content.

  • format (str, optional) – Format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’). Auto-detected if None.

Returns:

The parsed OPM object.

Return type:

Opm

static from_file(path, format)¶

Create an OPM message from a file.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Path to the input file.

  • format (str, optional) – Format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’). Auto-detected if None.

Returns:

The parsed OPM object.

Return type:

Opm

static from_str(data, format)¶

Create an OPM message from a string.

header¶

The message header.

Type:

OdmHeader

segment¶

The data segment.

Type:

OpmSegment

to_file(path, format)¶

Write to file.

Parameters:

  • path (str) – Output file path.

  • format (str) – Output format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’).

to_str(format)¶

Serialize to string.

Parameters:

format (str) – Output format (‘kvn’ or ‘xml’).

Returns:

The serialized string.

Return type:

str

class ccsds_ndm.OpmSegment(metadata, data)¶

Represents a single segment of an OPM.

data¶

Segment data.

Type:

OpmData

metadata¶

Segment metadata.

Type:

OpmMetadata

class ccsds_ndm.OpmMetadata(object_name, object_id, center_name, ref_frame, time_system, ref_frame_epoch, comment)¶

Create a new OPM Metadata object.

Parameters:

  • object_name (str) – Spacecraft name for which orbit state data is provided.

  • object_id (str) – Object identifier of the object for which orbit state data is provided.

  • center_name (str) – Origin of the reference frame.

  • ref_frame (str) – Reference frame in which state vector data is given.

  • time_system (str) – Time system used for state vector, maneuver, and covariance data.

  • ref_frame_epoch (str, optional) – Epoch of the reference frame, if not intrinsic to the definition.

  • comment (list of str, optional) – Comments.

center_name¶

Origin of the reference frame.

Type:

str

comment¶

Comments.

Type:

List[str]

object_id¶

Object identifier of the object for which orbit state data is provided.

Type:

str

object_name¶

Spacecraft name for which orbit state data is provided.

Type:

str

ref_frame¶

Reference frame in which state vector data is given.

Type:

str

ref_frame_epoch¶

Epoch of the reference frame, if not intrinsic to the definition.

Type:

Optional[str]

time_system¶

Time system used for state vector, maneuver, and covariance data.

Type:

str

class ccsds_ndm.OpmData(state_vector)¶

Create a new OPM Data object.

Parameters:

state_vector (StateVector) – State vector.

covariance_matrix¶

Covariance matrix.

Type:

Optional[OpmCovarianceMatrix]

keplerian_elements¶

Keplerian elements.

Type:

Optional[KeplerianElements]

maneuver_parameters¶

Maneuver parameters.

Type:

List[ManeuverParameters]

spacecraft_parameters¶

Spacecraft parameters.

Type:

Optional[SpacecraftParameters]

state_vector¶

State vector.

Type:

StateVector

user_defined_parameters¶

User defined parameters.

Type:

Optional[UserDefined]

class ccsds_ndm.OpmCovarianceMatrix(cx_x, cy_x, cy_y, cz_x, cz_y, cz_z, cx_dot_x, cx_dot_y, cx_dot_z, cy_dot_x, cy_dot_y, cy_dot_z, cz_dot_x, cz_dot_y, cz_dot_z, cx_dot_x_dot, cy_dot_x_dot, cy_dot_y_dot, cz_dot_x_dot, cz_dot_y_dot, cz_dot_z_dot, cov_ref_frame)¶
comments¶

Comments associated with this covariance matrix.

Type:

List[str]

cov_ref_frame¶

Reference frame for the covariance matrix.

If omitted, the covariance is expressed in the same reference frame as the state vector (REF_FRAME from metadata).

Type:

Optional[str]

cx_dot_x¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [4,1] element (X_DOT-X covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cx_dot_x_dot¶

Velocity covariance [4,4] element (X_DOT-X_DOT variance).

Units: km²/s²

Type:

float

cx_dot_y¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [4,2] element (X_DOT-Y covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cx_dot_z¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [4,3] element (X_DOT-Z covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cx_x¶

Position covariance [1,1] element (X-X variance).

Units: km²

Type:

float

cy_dot_x¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [5,1] element (Y_DOT-X covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cy_dot_x_dot¶

Velocity covariance [5,4] element (Y_DOT-X_DOT covariance).

Units: km²/s²

Type:

float

cy_dot_y¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [5,2] element (Y_DOT-Y covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cy_dot_y_dot¶

Velocity covariance [5,5] element (Y_DOT-Y_DOT variance).

Units: km²/s²

Type:

float

cy_dot_z¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [5,3] element (Y_DOT-Z covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cy_x¶

Position covariance [2,1] element (Y-X covariance).

Units: km²

Type:

float

cy_y¶

Position covariance [2,2] element (Y-Y variance).

Units: km²

Type:

float

cz_dot_x¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [6,1] element (Z_DOT-X covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cz_dot_x_dot¶

Velocity covariance [6,4] element (Z_DOT-X_DOT covariance).

Units: km²/s²

Type:

float

cz_dot_y¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [6,2] element (Z_DOT-Y covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cz_dot_y_dot¶

Velocity covariance [6,5] element (Z_DOT-Y_DOT covariance).

Units: km²/s²

Type:

float

cz_dot_z¶

Position-Velocity cross-covariance [6,3] element (Z_DOT-Z covariance).

Units: km·km/s

Type:

float

cz_dot_z_dot¶

Velocity covariance [6,6] element (Z_DOT-Z_DOT variance).

Units: km²/s²

Type:

float

cz_x¶

Position covariance [3,1] element (Z-X covariance).

Units: km²

Type:

float

cz_y¶

Position covariance [3,2] element (Z-Y covariance).

Units: km²

Type:

float

cz_z¶

Position covariance [3,3] element (Z-Z variance).

Units: km²

Type:

float

class ccsds_ndm.KeplerianElements(semi_major_axis, eccentricity, inclination, ra_of_asc_node, arg_of_pericenter, gm, true_anomaly, mean_anomaly)¶
arg_of_pericenter¶

Argument of pericenter.

Units: deg

Type:

float

comments¶

Comments associated with the Keplerian elements.

Type:

List[str]

eccentricity¶

Eccentricity.

Type:

float

gm¶

Gravitational coefficient (GM).

Units: km³/s²

Type:

float

inclination¶

Inclination.

Units: deg

Type:

float

mean_anomaly¶

Mean anomaly.

Units: deg

Type:

Optional[float]

ra_of_asc_node¶

Right ascension of the ascending node.

Units: deg

Type:

float

semi_major_axis¶

Semi-major axis.

Units: km

Type:

float

true_anomaly¶

True anomaly.

Units: deg

Type:

Optional[float]
